feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Genomics of Finnish reindeer
entry.summary: I am very excited to share that our work on reindeer genomics was published in Scientific Reports earlier this week. It was a challenging yet exciting journey for me (and I guess all authors) and I feel honored to be part of this project.
